login.welcomeMessage: Submit your credentials to access the IoT platform
login.unavailable: The backend is unavailable or too slow. Please try again later.
login.twoFactorMessage-AUTHENTICATOR: Enter your Authenticator code to continue
login.twoFactorMessage-SMS: Enter your SMS code to continue
login.twoFactorMessage-EMAIL: Enter your Email code to continue
login.eulaAcceptMessage: A new version of the terms of use for this service is available, before accessing it, you must accept them. The following link allows you to consult them.
login.eulaAcceptSwitch: By activating this switch, I accept the new terms of use
login.passwordExpired: Your password has expired, please change it to continue.
login.passwordSize: Password must be at least 8 characters long
login.passwordLostMessage: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link
login.passwordLostMessageSent: An email has been sent with instructions to reset your password, this email is only valid for a few minutes, if you don't find it, please check your spam folder. You can close this page.
login.emailSize: Email address must be at least 4 characters long
login.title: Connection
login.user-registration-received: Registration request received, please check your email to confirm your registration
login.user-creation-missing-password: Password is mandatory for account creation
login.user-creation-password-rules-matching: Password does not match the rules
login.user-profile-password-not-valid: User password does not respect the formating rules
login.user-profile-key-not-valid: User password reset key is not valid
login.user-profile-key-not-found: User password reset key not found or expired
login.user-upgrade-brute-force: Brute force attack detected, please wait
login.user-profile-2fa-sms-not-supported: 2FA method SMS is not yet supported
login.user-profile-condition-not-found: Admin did not setup the user conditions
login.user-profile-customfields-upserted: User profile's custom fields have been updated
login.backendTimeout: The backend did not respond within the expected time. Please try again later.
login.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

users.registerMessage: To register, please provide your email address.
users.registerMessCode: If you have been given an invitation code, please enter it; otherwise, leave the field blank.
users.registerMessCodeMust: You have been given an invitation code, please enter it.
users.registerWithEmail: An email will be sent to you to confirm your address. It is valid for a limited time. If you do not find it within 5 minutes, please check your spam folder.
users.registerAdminValid: Finally, an administrator will manually validate your registration. You will receive a confirmation email once your account is activated.
users.registeredMessage: Your registration request has been received, please follow the next steps, you will soon be able to log in.
users.verificationKeyMissing: The verification key is missing, invalid address.
users.creationMessage: To create your account, please create your password.
users.creationMessageCond: Please also accept the terms of use of the service. You can consult them
users.successRedirectMessage: You will be shortly redirected to the login page.
users.passwordChangeSuccess: Your password has been changed successfully.

tools.toasterDisconnectedMessage: The backend is unavailable or too slow. Please try again later.

profile.gen_description: This information helps us better personalize your experience.
profile.gen_emailDesc: Your email address cannot be changed.
profile.gen_firstNameDesc: Your first name is used to personalize communications.
profile.gen_lastNameDesc: Your last name is used to personalize communications.
profile.gen_languageDesc: The language of the user interface.
profile.error_notLoggedIn: You are not logged in, please log in to access your profile.

common.backendTimeout: The backend did not respond within the expected time. Please try again later.
common.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
